channel.title: Arctic Blooms Client problem :( *FIXED*

unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 93 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Please help :(
**EDIT:: FIXED IT MYSELF :) ILL EXPLAIN HOW** At the beginning of Client.java there is a piece of code that says: [code] is474 = true, is480 = false, idToggle = false, hitbarToggle = true, menuToggle = true, namesToggle = false, hitmarks = true;[/code]
Simply change that piece of code to this:
[code] is474 = true, is480 = false, is459 = false, is508 = false, is525 = false, is562 = false, idToggle = false, hitbarToggle = true, menuToggle = true, namesToggle = false, hitmarks = true;[/code]
Enjoy :)

EDIT:: FIXED IT MYSELF ILL EXPLAIN HOW
At the beginning of Client.java there is a piece of code that says:

is474 = true, is480 = false, idToggle = false, hitbarToggle = true, menuToggle = true, namesToggle = false, hitmarks = true;

Simply change that piece of code to this:

is474 = true, is480 = false, is459 = false, is508 = false, is525 = false, is562 = false, idToggle = false, hitbarToggle = true, menuToggle = true, namesToggle = false, hitmarks = true;

Enjoy
